Desde que me entendo por gente, sempre a: For as long as I can remember, I've always loved all kinds of technology, always looking for news on the market, trying to get an overview of everything.
Comecei meu trajeto nesse meio em 2013,: I started my journey in this field in 2013, when I joined the Etec José Martimiano da Silva teaching school, where I took the Computer Technician course, encompassing both front and back end.
motivationPhrase: In this technology environment, the phrase that guides me is: 'If a human being was capable of creating, I am 100% capable of understanding all of its content.' With that in mind, I'm always dedicated to learning all I can about the technology I'm currently using.
